author: Staff Reporter
text:
Complaint against Councillor

Following a heated discussion and argument in the BBMP council on Thursday, G. K. Venkatesh, Congress councillor from Yeshwantpur ward, filed a police complaint against K. B. Mamatha Vasudev, the BJP councillor from J.P. Park.

Mr. Venkatesh alleged that he received death threats in the council meeting before other councillors and the Mayor.
title: Complaint against councillor
